Actors: Anthony Hopkins, Joan Allen, Powers Boothe, Ed Harris
Writer: Stephen J. Rivele, Christopher Wilkinson, Oliver Stone
Title: Nixon
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 13 nominations.
Plot: A biographical story of former U.S. President Richard Milhous Nixon, from his days as a young boy, to his eventual Presidency, which ended in shame.
